reviews.text: As a single female traveler doing research in the Trujillo area for a few days, Los Conquistadores provided a very warm and comfortable base -- within a couple of hours I had met all the staff at the hotel, who greeted me personally on every appearance, helped me get cabs, gave me tips etc (they also arrange an airport pick-up and drop-off). The hotel tends to cater to tour groups, which also creates a very friendly atmosphere, and it's right in the center of town, but the rooms have no noise problems. And the rooms themselves are huge -- a little dilapidated, a touch on the kitschy side, and hairdryers need to be specially requested, but otherwise very comfortable. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Comfortable and friendly base in Trujillo
